TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Faki, title = Faki, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faki} }

S.FORM: faki :I cowa ci faki no miso? O tadaso linay a rihadayay ko niyaro' no 'Amis, mafana' a mapapadang to demak no masamaamaanay a demak no niyaro'. Pakayni to raramod i, maolah ko kaying to pipaini no faki, pasifana'en no faki to cacicfayaw a demak, Ano maraod to ko pipararamodan i, o inato noya kaying ko mamipalimo'ot to wawa ningra.
